data.title: Lunch in Downtown Detroit
data.text: Four of us ate lunch at this restaurant on a Saturday afternoon in October of 2016.  I ordered a bistro said which had fresh ingredients and was tasty.  The other three in our group ordered different types of tacos. We all just had water to drink. They all enjoyed their taco entrees.  We did not have a reservation and were seated right away.  This restaurant shares a bathroom with the building it is in - you need to get a key to the restroom from someone at the restaurant.  The restaurant was not that busy as we were there about 2pm on a Saturday afternoon.

data.title: Scrumptous
data.text: Enjoyed a Sunday lunch on my first day in Detroit, easy walking distance from my hotel on the Riverfront. On my own, I sat at the bar (my first time) and enjoyed delicious local beer and Salmon Flatbread.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Stopped in prior to a hockey game. Service was a little slow at first. Our server was hanging out at the bar for about ten min before she realized she had a table and spent the rest of the visit trying to make up for it. The food however was outstanding. The calamari was the best we have ever had and our burger and salad were amazing. The hardest working person in there was the bus boy/server assistant. Wish I got his name. Our water glasses were always full and he had a smile on his face the entire time. Was constantly moving and was a joy to talk to.

data.title: Detroit Burger I love you.
data.text: Came here for lunch with co-workers the other day.  We were told we would have a 30 minute wait but then luckily were seated right away.  Service was great.  The fig flatbread was delicious.  The Detroit burger was ridiculously good save for the zip sauce which was a bit too salty for me (although zip sauce is normally salty so maybe it's just me).  The mushrooms are to die for!  My only complaint is the fries were pretty soggy and lackluster considering the burger was so fricken good.  Hopefully it was just a bad batch!  I would definitely recommend this restaurant and plan to be back soon!

data.title: Expensive but really good.
data.text:
Just left from this place.   I had the steak frites.  You should have the steak frites.   It's ridiculously good.  Wow.   I may go back tomorrow for the same damn thing.  

They put a thick sauce on it that my wife would probably not prefer, but I  thought mine was perfection.  

Steak Frites + Happy Hour Drink came to $42 (not including tip), so don't come here if you're trying to save, but if you want something tasty then come here and order that Steak Frites.

I should add that they put a thick sauce on the steak that my wife would probably not prefer, but I thought mine was perfection.   Even better than the Buddy's Pizza I had last night!

data.title: Great!
data.text: I came here for lunch on a Saturday. There was no wait at all, which was awesome! I called ahead just in case. I ordered two appetizers for my meal as both were among the most lauded items here on Tripdvisor. The calamari was interesting and decent. It was very sweet as it had sweet soy glaze. Next, I had the fig flatbread, which was REALLY GOOD! I hate goat cheese, but that dish made it so good! The Brussels sprouts in this dish is far superior than Michael Symon's Roast Brussels sprouts dish! The atmosphere was really nice too! Very urban chic! And the servers were all very kind! It is a bit expensive though, but I was lucky as my first fig flatbread was burnt, so they had to make another one and gave it to me free due to the extended wait! I will definitely come back again!

data.title: There is a difference between a good drink and a strong stiff one
data.text: Amazing eats, hate to say it but for the price of the craft cocktails they could use some work. Over/under poured. Just cause it's top shelf doesn't mean it should be all liquor. Loved it but defiantly some room for improvement. I could have easily been plastered off one drink lol.

data.title: Excellent lunch
data.text: I always enjoy lunch here.  The hamburgers are great as well as the grilled salad.  Looking forward to returning.

data.title: Yummy!
data.text: We went in for lunch.  Busy place, great food, good portions, lots of excitement here!  Would come again!!!

data.title: Surprisingly good food
data.text: An apparently simple menu but all choices had an interesting twist. Burger with mushrooms and 'zip' was delicious as was cauliflower salad lacedcwith alm I nds and other treats. Great soucy popcirn too!

data.title: Fantastic place!
data.text:
From the moment we walked in till we left....simply amazing!!  Delicious food, great waiter and the decor is funky but nice!!! Make sure you put this on your list. 
Calamari appetizer great choice 
Cheese curds awesome 
Detroit Burger one of the best burgers I have ever had!
Didn't have room for dessert. Will need to visit again!!

data.title: Urban-Industrial, Trendy, and Great Food
data.text: Central Kitchen restaurant is a very energetic/high energy environment.  Great for meet ups with friends and or after work with colleagues. The menu is creative and the drinks don't disappoint.  If you love good food and trendy places then this is your spot!!!

data.title: Wow
data.text: Amazing vibe, great food, excellent service, and awesome atmosphere. Highly recommend, one of Detroit's new jewels!

data.title: Great casual meal
data.text: Fantastic meal, great service at this happening place in downtown Detroit. We had the mussels and then Detroit burgers with sides of Mac and cheese and fries. Really good all around. Mussels are one of the best I've ever tasted, need to ask for more bread to dip in the sauce .

data.title: Great food!!
data.text: This was our 2nd visit. The first was on a weekend night and we felt like we were being overlooked as it took well over an hour to be seated and we saw ppl coming in after us getting seated. Loud club like atmosphere at dinner which wasn't my favorite but the food was very good! Went again recently for brunch. Although the brunch menu is small, we all very much enjoyed our food.

data.title: Cool decor and atmosphere
data.text: Nice atmosphere, cool decor. The weather was perfect so we sat on the delightful little patio. Food was solid, nothing overly amazing. Bloody Mary had bacon in it which is always a plus in my book.

data.title: Ideal birthday brunch!
data.text: I took my friend here for a very belated birthday meal.   Although the interior was very attractive, we had perfect weather to eat on the patio.  Our server was a young woman who seemed to really know her stuff, and was pleasant without being pushy.  She let us take our time with the menu and catch up on conversation.  When my friend questioned the jalapeño infused cocktail, the waitress insisted that she could try it and then change it if she didn't like it.  The tacos and seafood that we tried were all delicious, and the ambiance was terrific.  Would go again for a special occasion or night out!

data.title: Brits in Detroit
data.text: We were staying in the Renaissance Centre and decided to walk into town and find somewhere to eat. We had been warned to do neither! Didn't see too much until we saw this place. It looked good from the outside so we went in. Cool bar and staff and a great mix of people. I noticed a bottle of Campari behind the bar so asked if they could mix me up a cocktail with it which they duly obliged and it was delicious - the fourth tasted as good as the first! The food looked great so we ordered some things from the menu. It was all really well cooked and presented. The atmosphere was fantastic (it was a Friday night after all). We left very satisfied but didn't want to go mad as we had booked a city tour of the derelict sites the following morning which was super. Don't believe what people say about this place - just be sensible and you can enjoy it - everyone we met were awesome - I only wish we had more time here. Thank you Detroit for a fabulous 24 hours!

user_location.name: New Forest National Park Hampshire, United Kingdom

data.title: Very good food.
data.text: On the pricey side for a daily lunch.  I do go here for a treat, now and then.  Good burgers.  Food is fresh and the service is excellent.

data.title: Great atmosphere
data.text: Great food, great drinks, bar tenders are really nice & know their drinks an on Friday night they have a Dj
